situation.title: Possibilities and obligations of foreigners when entering the CZ
situation.meta_description: Rules and recommendations for entering the territory of the Czech Republic.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

In general, foreigners from EU countries can enter the territory of the Czech Republic with the condition of filling in the arrival form and undergo the PCR test (either a test from the territory of the EU states not elder than 72 hours, or a test in the Czech Republic within five days). Otherwise, the traveler must remain in quarantine for 10 days.

Additional conditions for entry apply to foreigners from countries outside the EU. Conditions for travelers from countries that are not on the list of countries with a low risk of infection can be found in this protection measure.

Several rules and exceptions apply to foreigners entering the territory of the Czech Republic, which are clearly described on the website of the Ministry of the Interior of the Czech Republic.

In case of doubts or questions, please call the Ministry of the Interior of the Czech Republic: +420 974 820 680 - option 3 (Mon - Thu: 8:00 - 16:00 and Fri: 8:00 - 12:00). Or by e-mail: cestovani.covid19@mvcr.cz. Information is available in Czech and English language.
